CustomField.description: Enterprise Engagement type Opps have this field set to the related Account's Market Reach value by flows on Opp (Opportunity - Enterprise Engagement Set Account Market Reach) and Account (Account - Set Enterprise Engagement Opportunity Account Market Reach). This field grants Opportunity read access to Global Team via criteria based sharing rule (Multi-Market Opportunity Visibility). Criteria sharing rules cannot reference formula fields.
CustomField.label: Account Market Reach
